entries.name: Monorepo Structure
entries.description: Single repository for all apps and packages to simplify code sharing and dependency management. Enables better collaboration and reduces duplication.

entries.name: TypeScript
entries.description: Strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript. Provides better developer experience and catches errors at compile time.

entries.name: React
entries.description: JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Our primary frontend framework with excellent ecosystem and community support.

entries.name: Drizzle ORM
entries.description: Type-safe, modern ORM for PostgreSQL with excellent TypeScript support and performance.

entries.name: RTK Query
entries.description: Modern data fetching and caching solution for React apps. Provides automatic caching, background updates, and optimistic updates.

entries.name: Vitest
entries.description: Fast, modern test runner for TypeScript and JavaScript. Excellent Vite integration and developer experience.

entries.name: Zod
entries.description: TypeScript-first schema validation library. Used for API validation, form validation, and type safety across the application.

entries.name: Tailwind CSS
entries.description: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development. Provides consistent design system and excellent developer experience.

entries.name: shadcn/ui
entries.description: Re-usable components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS. Provides accessible, customizable components for consistent UI.

entries.name: pnpm
entries.description: Fast, disk space efficient package manager. Perfect for monorepos with excellent workspace support.

entries.name: Vite
entries.description: Next generation frontend tooling. Extremely fast development server and build tool with excellent plugin ecosystem.

entries.name: AWS Lambda
entries.description: Serverless compute platform for scalable backend services. Reduces operational overhead and provides automatic scaling.

entries.name: Serverless Framework
entries.description: Framework for deploying serverless applications. Simplifies AWS Lambda deployment and configuration.

entries.name: Jest
entries.description: JavaScript testing framework for backend testing. Used alongside Supertest for comprehensive API testing.

entries.name: Docker
entries.description: Containerization platform for consistent development and deployment environments.

entries.name: GraphQL
entries.description: Query language for APIs. Under consideration for future features that require flexible data fetching.

entries.name: Next.js
entries.description: React framework with SSR/SSG capabilities. Not used in this project as we prefer pure React with Vite.

entries.name: Express.js
entries.description: Web application framework for Node.js. Replaced by Serverless Framework for our backend needs.

entries.name: MongoDB
entries.description: NoSQL database. Not used in this project as we prefer PostgreSQL with Drizzle ORM.

entries.name: Webpack
entries.description: JavaScript module bundler. Replaced by Vite for better performance and developer experience.

entries.name: Redux Toolkit
entries.description: Official, opinionated Redux toolkit. Considering for complex state management needs.

entries.name: PostgreSQL
entries.description: Reliable, open-source relational database. Our primary database with excellent TypeScript support through Drizzle.

entries.name: React Hook Form
entries.description: Performant, flexible forms library for React. Excellent integration with Zod for validation.

entries.name: Ethereal Email
entries.description: Fake SMTP service for email testing in development. Provides real email testing without external dependencies.
